Name: lancache-bundle
Overview: An all in one lancache docker providing a combination of the following three projects:
CAComment: This template is set up to use a custom network. You may have to adjust the network or IP address etc to match your system

HTTPS Port.Name: HTTPS Port
HTTPS Port.Description:
Container Port: 443
SNIProxy port, don't change!

LANCACHE_IP.Name: LANCACHE_IP
LANCACHE_IP.Description: IP Address of cache container. (Has to be the same as the HOST's IP. If you set the container's IP to 192.168.1.202 this has to be the same. If you use bridge it has to be the same as unRAID's IP.)

DNS_BIND_IP.Name: DNS_BIND_IP
DNS_BIND_IP.Description: IP Address of cache container. (Has to be the same as the HOST's IP. If you set the container's IP to 192.168.1.202 this has to be the same. If you use bridge it has to be the same as unRAID's IP.)

CACHE_MAX_AGE.Name: CACHE_MAX_AGE
CACHE_MAX_AGE.Description: Max age for files in the cache

USE_GENERIC_CACHE.Name: USE_GENERIC_CACHE
USE_GENERIC_CACHE.Description: Must be set to true to use generic cache

DISABLE_ARENANET.Name: DISABLE_ARENANET
DISABLE_ARENANET.Description: Set to true to disable arenanet caching

DISABLE_BLIZZARD.Name: DISABLE_BLIZZARD
DISABLE_BLIZZARD.Description: Set to true to disable blizzard caching

DISABLE_CITYOFHEROES.Name: DISABLE_CITYOFHEROES
DISABLE_CITYOFHEROES.Description: Set to true to disable cityofheroes caching

DISABLE_DAYBREAK.Name: DISABLE_DAYBREAK
DISABLE_DAYBREAK.Description: Set to true to disable daybreak caching

DISABLE_EPICGAMES.Name: DISABLE_EPICGAMES
DISABLE_EPICGAMES.Description: Set to true to disable epicgames caching

DISABLE_FRONTIER.Name: DISABLE_FRONTIER
DISABLE_FRONTIER.Description: Set to true to disable frontier caching

DISABLE_HIREZ.Name: DISABLE_HIREZ
DISABLE_HIREZ.Description: Set to true to disable hirez caching

DISABLE_NEVERWINTER.Name: DISABLE_NEVERWINTER
DISABLE_NEVERWINTER.Description: Set to true to disable neverwinter caching

DISABLE_NEXUSMODS.Name: DISABLE_NEXUSMODS
DISABLE_NEXUSMODS.Description: Set to true to disable nexusmods caching

DISABLE_NINTENDO.Name: DISABLE_NINTENDO
DISABLE_NINTENDO.Description: Set to true to disable nintendo caching

DISABLE_ORIGIN.Name: DISABLE_ORIGIN
DISABLE_ORIGIN.Description: Set to true to disable origin caching

DISABLE_RENEGADEX.Name: DISABLE_RENEGADEX
DISABLE_RENEGADEX.Description: Set to true to disable renegadex caching

DISABLE_RIOT.Name: DISABLE_RIOT
DISABLE_RIOT.Description: Set to true to disable riot caching

DISABLE_ROCKSTAR.Name: DISABLE_ROCKSTAR
DISABLE_ROCKSTAR.Description: Set to true to disable rockstar caching

DISABLE_SONY.Name: DISABLE_SONY
DISABLE_SONY.Description: Set to true to disable sony caching

DISABLE_STEAM.Name: DISABLE_STEAM
DISABLE_STEAM.Description: Set to true to disable steam caching

DISABLE_TESO.Name: DISABLE_TESO
DISABLE_TESO.Description: Set to true to disable teso caching

DISABLE_TWITCH.Name: DISABLE_TWITCH
DISABLE_TWITCH.Description: Set to true to disable twitch caching

DISABLE_UPLAY.Name: DISABLE_UPLAY
DISABLE_UPLAY.Description: Set to true to disable uplay caching

DISABLE_WARFRAME.Name: DISABLE_WARFRAME
DISABLE_WARFRAME.Description: Set to true to disable warframe caching

DISABLE_WARGAMING.Name: DISABLE_WARGAMING
DISABLE_WARGAMING.Description: Set to true to disable wargaming caching

DISABLE_WSUS.Name: DISABLE_WSUS
DISABLE_WSUS.Description: Set to true to disable windowsupdates caching

DISABLE_XBOXLIVE.Name: DISABLE_XBOXLIVE
DISABLE_XBOXLIVE.Description: Set to true to disable xboxlive caching

data.Name: data
data.Description: Location to store the cached files

DNS Logs.Name: DNS Logs
DNS Logs.Description: Location to store the DNS logs

Nginx Logs.Name: Nginx Logs
Nginx Logs.Description: Location to store the Nginx logs
